name: Death Fight
description:
Death Fight is an cool and offline action fighting game. This arcade game stunning 2D graphics, simple side-scrolling interface and easy-to-learn & cool controls. Death Fight has wide range of skills you can mix for devastating combos. Arcade fans will have an blood pumping combat experience!
Death fight tribute to classic fighting game，our developer also add new action element into classic action game to meet your fighting soul. we believe The soul of arcade games are never gone. Endless combo, Diverse characters，will makes you can not stop playing this game.
In this fighting game，you will play an assassin who is Framed by an mysterious evil. He was taken to a mysterious and dangerous place called death fight r. he were inoculated poisons，and the evil organization put the antidote in the top floor of the tower. jack should go to top floor to live.
Features:
-Simple one-touch controls.
-Smooth, easy, addictive & intuitive gameplay.
-Smooth fighting action.
-Different upgrade way.
-cool and different skills for each role.
Download it now!
